Text:
thethingy,

I nor do other people thank you enough for how much you help.  I am working on a web design degree and there is no way I could have made it without your sharing and help.  I have an engineering degree but programming has taken a new meaning.  All your stuff works!  I have never had any issues or problems and it lasts so long as I follow directions.  Dude, I do not not know where you get all this stuff or even have time to crack it and have time to eat dinner, but on behalf of many, We appreciate your efforts towards education and program exploration.

I wish there was a way I could communicate one on one at times.  I guess that is up to you and my email.  As well I must thank the system admin. as well for keep a top notch site.  I hope to offer something in return.

Respectfully,

G
hbg716@yahoo.com

I'm following hbg716's praise here...

If it weren't for you and a select few others that give good torrents and great instructions I would have probably never even messed with any of it.  But thanks to you and the others mentioned I'm able to have a few things that I never would have been able to have.  Thanks from me as well.
thethingy, you're da best on hur..... I've ben gatherin my tutorial dvds and you have really helped me out a lot....one love MAN!

Many thanks, thingy. Had some problems tho... audio seems to be out of sync and when I try to convert them to mpeg so I could play them on my DVD player Video Mastering Works crashes every time. Any suggestions? Same thing with some of the other titles where the audio is out of sync.
thanks man.. great job as always all my vids are in sync not sure why one guy has probs

oh .. but one question it might be stupid i was wondering how to obtain the exercise files that was stated in the video i thought i saw it some where but when i looked again i saw nothing any ideas thanks
appreciate ya bro.. been runnin dreamweaver and just needed some refernce points.. thanks much bro
Thank you I really appreciate all this.
Thank you for your generosity and sharing this knowledge!  It's really going to help me at work!
Thanks dude. by the way your coffee is still at the table. Relax and drink it then return helping us here. Great works
thanks a lot thethingy, keep on sharing...

thanks thethingy,
 i love your torrents you are the best!!!!
